TopicTitle: The Real McCoy: Petro Depot Pack

Articles.Content:
STOCK 20.2 rocket. This is a pack of 4 Ptero Depots. Other than MechJeb This is 100% Stock. They are numbered according to their range. Needs: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/12384-PART-0-20-Anatid-Robotics-MuMech-MechJeb-Autopilot-v2-0-8

WARNING: These are very Large Craft. If you have a Slow PC donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t try and use. THese craft have ranges from kerbin orbit to Dres with return vehicle*. Range and functionality fully tested*.

Not tested:) Ya I Lied.

To get to Jool, Eeloo, and Moho with Petro Depot IV after burning for Kerbin Escape Trajectory Transfer all Fuel you can to Main Nerva Engines. decouple Return Vehicle and operate the Petro Depot as a independent craft. (return Vehicle has more than enough fuel to return to kerbin at this point. and you just increase your range significantly without the extra mass.)
